children.subject: I am pretty sure most students in CS or EECS use Piazza frequently though.
I've found that the existence of EECS 101 isn't nearly as well advertised as it should be.

Being enrolled in their courses' Piazzas is not the same as paying attention to instructors' announcements in those Piazzas, let alone reading other students' posts in those Piazzas. (This has been a source of great frustration to me, as a TA, trying to convey some important announcement to all students.) And this all assumes that students are familiar with and check EECS101 in addition to their classes' Piazzas.

None of this accounts for the fact that the type of students who would regularly check Piazza are generally not the ones most need of advising. Or, say, include a sufficient number of CS-intended students like ones who haven't even enrolled in any CS courses yet, and don't have Piazza accounts.

(And then there's the usual voluntary poll sampling biases and the fact that this was posted over a holiday period et cetera.)

...as an aside, there's a reason I usually disable student-initiated polls in Piazzas I've been instructors for; too many people lack an understanding of how fundamentally flawed these sorts of polls are and try to use them to make claims that there isn't support for. Or they're trying to use them for some sort of "majority vote" to argue for some misguided change in class policy, with no basis in educational theory as to how classes should be run (i.e. not as a democracy).

I’m all for Piazza solution but this poll is biased towards students who frequently use Piazza. Those who prefer emails might not even have the opportunity to vote. Unless a full scale survey is conducted, this poll can not be used as evidence for fully adopting Piazza

TL;DR: sampling bias in this poll. Take caution.
3532 people enrolled in this Piazza and only 103 votes. Not gonna work :/

history.content: Hopefully this can offer us some insight into this tactful matter and guide the department to make the best policy. For motivation of this poll, refer to @5046 and the heated discussion at @5842.

answers.text: Piazza as the only official means. Private question will be done through private posts. Emails will be redirected to Piazza.
Emails as the only official means. Piazza becomes peer advising forum.
Facebook as the only official means.
